label: Private Banking and Wealth Management
description: Financial services for high net worth individuals and families, including investment management, trust services, and estate planning.

subcategories.label: Private Banks
subcategories.description: Banks that offer personalized financial services to high net worth individuals and families.

subcategories.label: Offshore Banking
subcategories.description: Banking services offered in a foreign country with favorable tax laws.

subcategories.label: Investment Management
subcategories.description: Professional management of assets and securities to achieve investment goals.

subcategories.label: Mortgages
subcategories.description: Loans for purchasing or refinancing a property.

subcategories.label: Family Offices
subcategories.description: Private wealth management advisory firms that serve ultra-high-net-worth families.
